translation.Keep track of your loved ones in real ti: Keep track of your loved ones in real time!
translation.Be the first to get notified when the pr: Be the first to get notified when the product is ready!
translation.We noticed the high level of insecurity: We noticed the high level of insecurity in the world, and we thought of how technology could be used to combat these insecurities.

translation.Keep track of your loved ones in real ti: Sevganlaringizni haqiqiy vaqt rejimida kuzatib boring!
translation.We noticed the high level of insecurity: Biz dunyodagi ishonchsizlikning yuqori darajasini payqadik va bu ishonchsizlikka qarshi kurashda texnologiyadan qanday foydalanish mumkinligi haqida o'yladik.
